    • addManager

      public void addManager(String name, String phone)
      Adds a manager to the project with the specified name and phone number.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the manager.
      phone - the phone number of the manager.

    • initProjectPhases

      public void initProjectPhases(Calendar actualDate, int phaseIndex, int amountMonthsBetweenProjects)
      Initializes the project phases with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      actualDate - the current date for the project.
      phaseIndex - the index of the current phase.
      amountMonthsBetweenProjects - the amount of months between each project phase.

    • endPhase

      public void endPhase()
      Ends the current project phase and starts the next one.

    • employeesInAProject

      public String[] employeesInAProject()
      Returns an array of strings representing the employees involved in the project. Each element of the array corresponds to the string representation of an Employee object.
      Returns:
      an array of strings representing the employees involved in the project

    • addCapsule

      public boolean addCapsule(String capsuleType, String description, int employeeNumber, String learnings)
      Adds a new capsule to the project.
      Parameters:
      capsuleType - the type of the capsule being added.
      description - the description of the capsule being added.
      employeeNumber - the number of the employee that created the capsule.
      learnings - the learnings associated with the capsule being added.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether or not the capsule was successfully added.

    • getCurrentPhase

      public Phase getCurrentPhase(int positionsToMoveToGetTheNextPhase)
      Returns the current phase of the project. The user can pick which phase from the actual one he wants to get if the this param is 0, the method will return the current phase.
      Parameters:
      positionsToMoveToGetTheNextPhase - the number of positions to move to get the next phase. if its needed.
      Returns:
      the current phase of the project.

    • approveCapsule

      public boolean approveCapsule(String ID)
      Approves a capsule in the project.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the capsule being approved.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether or not the capsule was successfully approved.

    • publishCapsule

      public String publishCapsule(String ID)
      Publishes a capsule in the project.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the capsule being published.
      Returns:
      the URL of the capsule that was published.

    • amountCapsulesByType

      public int amountCapsulesByType(String capsuleType)
      Returns the total amount of capsules of a specific type across all phases.
      Parameters:
      capsuleType - The type of capsules to be counted.
      Returns:
      The total amount of capsules of the given type across all phases.

    • learningsInAPhase

      public String learningsInAPhase(int phaseIndex)
      Returns the list of learnings in a specific phase.
      Parameters:
      phaseIndex - The index of the phase to retrieve the learnings from.
      Returns:
      The list of learnings in the specified phase.

    • capsulesOfAnEmployee

      public String capsulesOfAnEmployee(String employeeName)
      Returns the list of capsules written by an employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeName - The name of the employee to retrieve the capsules for.
      Returns:
      The list of capsules written by the specified employee.

    • InformLearningsOfCapsulesByHastag

      public String InformLearningsOfCapsulesByHastag(String query)
      Searches for learnings in capsules by hashtag across all phases.
      Parameters:
      query - The hashtag to search for.
      Returns:
      The search results containing learnings with the specified hashtag.
